Description: Determine best practices. Maintain the physical space. Set and enforce policies.
Research how coworking spaces run. Create a budget and game plan for initial set-up. Begin planning marketing and promotion.
Research how coworking spaces run. Solicit community feedback. Run trails.
Maintain databases and portal. Assist with analysis and reporting.
Collect data. Enter data. Basic reporting.
Seek out partners and funding opportunities. Work with stakeholders to define contract requirements. Direct grant writing. Meet regularly with partner organizations and individuals.
Implement business systems--payrol, formal job descriptions, insurance, etc. Hold regular meetings with select partner organizations and individuals. Solicit and apply for funding for Sprout phase.

Complete current information product projects. Investigate access gaps. Locate resources. Continue building relationships. Oversee and participate in research on community resources and funding opportunities.
Perform analysis and generate reports. Lead grant-writing efforts. Be responsible for obtaining necessary approvals, meeting all grant requirements, and submitting on time.
Locate resources. Collect and organize information. Conduct surveys.
